title: Thiago Motta - Wikipedia
snippet: In October 2019, he returned to Genoa as their manager, before he was fired in December following a poor run of results. In July 2021, Motta was appointed manager of Spezia, where he remained for one season, before taking over as manager of Bologna in September 2022, leading them to qualify for the Champions League in his second season. In June 2024, Motta was appointed head coach of Juventus. In March 2025, after being eliminated from the Champions League and general poor results, he was sacked.
